div.p:
Curia capitalis balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
duodecimo die mensis Januarij Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo
quarto quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo
Sectarum

the saide day the bailyeis and the consall deliuerit and ordanit the priour and
conuent of the freris predicatouris of Abirdene to obeyt ande ansuerit of
ane annuell Rent of tua merkis yerly of the land' pertening tile Arthour' of
forbes liand' in the gallougat eftir the tenour of this testimoniale and Instrument
of Sesin vndir the Sell of Androw culan bailye and Signe manuell of sere
Jonhne of Stirueling notar public' producit in Jugment for ony thinge as
yeit schevin on the contrar'

the saide day the bailyeis assignit this day feftene dais to James crak
to schew his assedacione' of the larde of barnis croft befor' thame

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per Willelmum Coupar deductis
de et super recuperacione proprietatis cuiusdam terre vaste Jacentis in vico
nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter communiones vias regias
versus oriens et occidens boriam et austrum et le calsay inter terram ipsius Willelmi
et terram Richardi hill versus occidens in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus
xiij s' et iiijor sibi a longo tempore debit' et non solut' vnde
dictus Willelmus peciit a ballivis secundum formam sui processus precedentis
Juris et iusticie Complementum Tunc Curia mature auisiata
decreuit quod dictus Willelmus possessionem et proprietatem dicte terre
legittime recuperauit in defectu Solucionis dicti annuj redditus Et
hoc ex ore Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris datum fuit pro Judicio Teste
Curia et cetera

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per thomam Waus de
ductis de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam
terre vaste Jacentis in vico viridi inter terram thome gledstane
versus occidens et communionem viam regiam versus oriens et terram ipsius
thome ex australi et terram Agnetis gilespy ex boreali in defectu solucionis
vnius annuj redditus sex s' et octo d' sibi a longo tempore
debit' et non solut' vnde dictus thomas peciit a ballivis
secundum formam sui processus precedentis iuris et Justicie comple
mentum Tunc curia mature auisiata decreuit quod dictus thomas
proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis
dicti annuj redditus Et hoc ex ore Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris curie
datum fuit pro Judicio Teste Curia Insuper Idem thomas
peciit inde Instrumentum Testibus Roberto blinsele alexandro rede thoma prat
Johanne ruthirfurd milite magistro Alexandro gordone Willelmo blinsell
philippo Dunbrek Andrea nachty henrico horum et thoma Jame
sone seriandis

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Andreas gray procurator domini
Roberti Waus capellanj ac procuratoris altaris Sancte marie mag
dalene infra ecclesiam beati Nicholaij de Abirdene situati et
protestatus fuit in forma iuris pro vno annuo redditu xxtj
s' sibi et dicto altari annuatim de quadam terra vasta Jacente
in vico nauium ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis
blak ex orientali ex vna et terram patricij andirsone ex occidentali partibus
ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in Curia
tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo still Willelmo
thoma philp et Andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram dominus matheus nicholsone collector
ac procurator capellanorum Collegij de Abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma
iuris pro vno annuo redditu quinque s' dictis capellanis annuatim debit'
de quodam antiquo horreo thome Cullane Jacente ex orientali parte
vie regie qua Itur ad le bolbrige inter terram olim Johannis gothrasone
ex australi et croftum fratrum predicatorum ex boriali Ad quam terram acce
dens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in
Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
Testibus Willelmo Still thoma philp et Andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus matheus nicholsone
collector ac procurator capellanorum Collegij de Abirdene et protestatus fuit in
forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu iiij s' et iiij d' dictis capellanis
annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico viridi inter
terram quondam Roberti club ex australi et torrentem ex boreali
et riuolum ab a lagdus a lacu distenden' versus occidens
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam primo die huius
processus Testibus Willlemo Still thoma philp et Andrea nachty seriando

the saide day the ballieis assignit this day xv dais
to Richerd Wricht to ansuer' to the borghe' Strekit one
him be Jonhne Sanclar' that he awe to releyve him and
his lande yerlie of x s' of annuell as he that allegis
him parcionar to him of that land liand in the castalgate

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Andreas
liall prior domus fratrum carmelitarum de Abirdene et nomine conuentus eiusdem
protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu quadraginta
denariorum sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico viridi
inter terram quondam Roberti club ex australi et torrentem ex boreali
et riuolum a lani distenden' versus occidens Ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
ballivis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam primo die
huius processus testibus thoma blak Willelmo harpar et thoma
Jamesone seriando

head.add: p leslie procuratorio nomine domine de barnis

div.p:
Eodem die accedens ad barram patricius leslie procurator domine de barnis et protestatus fuit
in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu quatuor s' et sex d' domino de barnis annuatim
debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico viridi inter terram quondam Roberti club ex
australi et torrentem ex boreali et riuolum a lacu distenden' versus occcidens
ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in Sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus thoma
blak Johanne harpar et thoma Jamesone seriando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram patricus leslie procurator domine de barnis et protestatus
in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu quinque solidorum domino de barnys annuatim debito
de quadam terra vasta Jacente in futy inter terram Andree murray Junioris
ex australi ex vna et terram quondam thome broysour' ex boriali
partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia
tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus thoma blak Johanne harpar
et thoma Jamesone seriando

The saide day the balyeis at command' of the consal present for the tym chargit Johne
low to pay the four' li' g' flandris money grantit avand obefor to vmquhil
arnald' vanstakinburghe to the procuratouris of the relict barnis and executouris of the saide
arnald' within terme of law quhar' It efferis

The saide day Jonhne low falyeit in his preiwe of fiwe li' g' and xviij g' flandris
money quhilk he allegit was pait to Arnald' vanstakinburghe for the quhilkis
he was in Amerciament of the court and aw to pay the said v li' g' and xviij g' within terme
of law eftir the saide Jonhnis obligacion be deliuerit to the balyeis or gevin to the said
Johne

The saide day Jonhne Stevin lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit falyeit
in his preiwe of vjxx futuale iiijor ottir Skinnis thre dakir of gaite skinnis
and ij fomert Skinnis quhilkis he allegit pait to Arnald' vanstakinburghe
In pament of xxvj s' g' aucht to him for the quhilkis the saide Johne was
In Amerciament of the court and aw to pay the said xxvj s' g'

The saide day Alexander Sanchar' falyeit in his preiwe of xxtj s and v g'
flandris money as it hed cours' the tym of the date of his obligacion
maid' to vmquhile Arnald' vanstakinburghe for the quhilkis the said Alexander
was in Amerciament of the court and aw to pay the saide xxtj s' g' and v g' to the
said procuratour

the saide day Jonhne Culane lauchfullie Callit and nocht comperit falyeit in
his prewe of fiwe li' g' flandris money quhilkis he allegit pait
to vmquhil arnald' vanstakinburghe portar of brugis for the quhilkis he
was in Amerciament of the courtis and aw to pay the saide fiwe li' g'

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Dauid Andirson' prior domus fratrum predicatorum
et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu sex s' et octo d' annuatim dictis fratribus
debit' de quodam terra vasta in vico Superiori ecclesie inter terram thome prat ex orientali et terram
thoma mar' ex australi et cetera Ad quam terram Accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus Willelmo
Stile thoma philp et Andrea nachtj seriando

Alexander chamer of murchill
Alexander menyeis
Thomas prat
Johne Wormet
Androw murray eldar
Dauid mar'

div.head: prior predicatorum
div.p:
Eodem die Accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater
Dauid Andirsone priour' vnius fratrum predicatorum et protesta
tatus protestatus fuit in forma iuris pro vno annuo Redditu
sex s' sibi et fratribus dicte domus annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta
Jacente in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter
terram quondam Ricardum Kintor ex australi ex vna et terram
Capellanum altaris Sancti petrj ex boreali partibus ab altera
Ad quam terram nichil Accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus
Willelmo Still thoma philp et Andreas nachtj seriando

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene xvjodie Januarij
quo supra

The saide day Dauid leis Sone to vmquhill William of leis
burges of this burghe was fundin be ane Suorne assis'
thomas prat forspekar prenteys' to William goldsmitht
to the fest of pasche next eftir follouing the date of this
Courte And four' yeris fra the saide pasche continualie to be
runnyn and complete

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem legittimam quod
Johannes Durvard est filius et heres quondam Johannis Durvard
patris suj Ideo datum fuit in mandatis Johanni menyes ballivo
ad cognoscendum eundem puerum ad terras et annuos redditus
sibi Jure hereditario decessum quondam patris suj contingen'

The saide day thomas prat forspekar to Anthonius laurence
procurator the relict barnis and executouris of vmquhile Arnalde Wane
stakinburghe askit at the balyeis pament of the Somes opte
nit be him be one the personis contenit in the Akis and court haldin
be thame the xij day of Januar' immediate bigane

The said day It was ordanit be the balyeis and court thate
Williame goldsmitht and James leis sal stande in ayfalde
cherite and tendirnes as efferis nichburis Ande gif ony of
thaim offendis to vthiris on tyme to Cum and beis conuikit tharintile
sal pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin
the saide partiis beinge oblist tharto be thar handis vphaldin

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Dauid andirsone
prior ac procurator domus fratrum predicatorum dicti burgi et protestatus fuit in
forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu octo s' annuatim sibi et dictis fratribus
debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico furcarum ex orientali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram magistri Alexandri Cullan rectoris de oyne ex australi ex
vna et terram Robertj Cullan ex boreali partibus ab altera et communiones vias
regias versus oriens et occidens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit
in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo stil thoma
philp et Andrea nachtj seriando

Eodem die Alisona liell fecit constituit et ordinavit Willelmi
blinsel et Dauid liell coniunctim et divisim suos legittimos procuratores
ad prosequendum in forma Juris quandam terram vastam quondam
Roberti club pertinen' ex australi parte vici Superioris ecclesie
pro solucione annuj Redditus xl d' coram preposito et ballivis huius
burgi agend' defendend' et cetera in vberiore forma procuratorij
promitten' de Rato et grato cum omnibus clasusulis necessariis et
oportunis

Curia balliuorum burgi per de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xix die Januarij quo supra

The saide day philp Dunbrek sergeand at commavnd of the balyeis
chargit thomas chamer talyour' to remane within the tolbutht
quhile he releuit thomes buchan of liij s' aucht to gilbert
menyeis

Eodem die Johannes lammyntone in Amerciamento Curie per confessionem lingue
proprie pro Inobediencia thome Jamesone seriandi in execucione suj officij
Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Alexander forbes in le Schipraw in Amerciamento Curie per
confessionem lingue proprie per deforciacione thome Jamesone
seriandi in execucione suj officij Ac ad emendabunt ut Jura
volunt

This is the compt of the kirk werk gevine' be Alexander
Rede burges of this burgh' to the Aldirman balyeis Counsale
ande communite of the samyn the tuenty day of august the yeir'
of gode ane thousand' four hundreth nynty and auch yeris The
masonys and ale smale thingis pait to the day of the making
of this writ awand' to sanct nicholes' the saide day
In the first be alexander red of this Witsonday maile bigane' iij li'
Of Androw Wodis maile of the forsaide terme viiij li'
Item be Jonhne Wormet iiij li'
Williame Kintor iiij li'
Dauid menyeis iij li'
gilbert menyeis iiij merkis
Williame chamer iiij merkis
be Dauid mathouson' fyfty v s' of the maile of
the mydchingill of the secunde tend'
Androw Cullane lv s' of the samyn
Williame futhes lv s' of the samyn
Robert crage lv s' of the samyn
henry Red ane merk
Summa of this siluere is xxxix li'
Item tua barellis of salmond' v li'
Item the brede four soudars viiij merkis
Summa totalis xlix li' vj s' viij d'
The thrid barell of salmond' was sauld' for
part of pament of the monethtis stage gane obefor'
Her'of of thir Somez pait out at command'
of the aldirman and' part of the Counsaile
In primis to the master of the tymmere schip for ane hundreth
gret tymmere xlv crownis
